question: The name of the CM who launched the "Livelihood Intervention and Facilitation of Entrepreneurship" (LIFE) is __________.
explanation: Meghalaya Chief Minister Mukul Sangma launched the ambitious flagship programme titled "Livelihood Intervention and Facilitation of Entrepreneurship" (LIFE) at Songsak in East Garo Hills. The program for the year 2017 - 18 aims to launch the particular program at 2144 villages.
